### Why {{< var theme.name >}}?

The theme name {{< var theme.name >}} was chosen as it resembles
many different aspects of why this theme has been created and who created it.

One of the main goal was to develop a [Quarto]({{< var links.quarto-websites >}}) theme
which allows us to replace existing websites built with the [jekyll](https://jekyllrb.com/).
One of the features missing were the '_rotating header images_', one of the main
reasons for the name {{< var theme.name >}}.

In addition, _R_ is the first letter of the first name of the authors and one of his
preferred programming languages: [R]({{< var links.r >}}).

[Quarto]({{< var links.quarto >}}) helps to 'lift' and raise dynamic documents
to the next level using quarto to create websites, presentations, exercises and documents
using [_R_]({{< var links.r }}), [Python]({{< var.links.python >}}) and
[Julia]({{< var links.julia >}}).
